mapper.select: SELECT su.user_account, su.user_name, su.mobile_phone, su.create_time, ( SELECT sus.user_name FROM sys_user sus WHERE sus.user_id = su.user_id ) create_name FROM t_user_role_relation rr LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.role_id = rr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.user_id = rr.user_id WHERE rr.role_id =#{id} and su.is_deleted = 0
SELECT ur.role_id, sr.role_name FROM t_user_role_relation ur LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
